div.p: Climatic and non-climatic predictors of brood size in Canada jays. The frequency of freezeâ€“thaw events ( a), mean pre-breeding temperature ( b) and lay date ( c) were all negatively correlated with brood size. Female age was positively correlated with brood size ( d). The shaded area on each graph represents a 95% confidence interval. Each line is taken from the top model as determined through model selection using AICc.
